div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in ActConsentType
Import all the codes that are contained in ActPrivacyPolicy
Import all the codes that are contained in ActConsentDirective
Import all the codes that are contained in ActPrivacyLaw
Import all the codes that are contained in InformationSensitivityPolicy
Import all the codes that are contained in ActInformationSensitivityPolicy
Import all the codes that are contained in RoleInformationSensitivityPolicy
Import all the codes that are contained in EntityInformationSensitivityPolicy
Import all the codes that are contained in Compartment

description.value: Security observation values used to indicate security category metadata. V:SecurityCategoryObservationValue is the union of V:PrivacyPolicyType, V:ActPrivacyLaw, V:ActConsentDirective, V:InformationSensitivityPolicy, V:ActInformationSensitivityPolicy, V:RoleInformationSensitivityPolicy, V:EntityInformationSensitivityPolicy, and the V:ActConsentType value used to populate the SecurityCategoryObservationValue attribute in order to convey one or more nonhierarchical categories of sensitivity metadata, which are used to control access to data more finely than with hierarchical security classification alone. Could be bound R1 to a V:ActUSPrivacyPolicy in a future US Realm.
